title: Casual Women A Short Story
description: Maddy is recently widowed, a lonely woman who is desperately trying to cope with her feelings. Life is not going well for her... until one evening when her friend takes her to a meeting, a group of women who belong to a dating club.Maddy's life changes overnight. The women meet men at arranged private parties. The rule? She can only be with a given man at one time. Suddenly Maddy's desires and sexual tension are met beyond her dreams. Maddy becomes addicted to this new life until something dreadful happens.Casual Women is a short story. However, after many requests, C. Michaels is expanding it to a full novel. Look for it's release by the end of Summer, 2013.
author: C. Michaels
